item.title: Title: The Shrieking Shroud Lifts: ZOE MARIE FEDEROFF, CRADLE OF FILTH's Sonic Sorceress, Steps Off The Graveyard Stage
item.description:
Description: ![The Skulls in the Pit Salute You, Zoe](https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/7f9737f2506941499994d771a29ad47a/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Cradle-Of-Filth-2023-1024x576.png)
Looks like Cradle of Filth's keys and vocal enchantress, Zoe Marie Federoff, is peeling off her banshee's wail and handing in the blackened keys of doom. Today, she took the decision to part ways with the gothic metal legion and embark on her own.
Get the full, flesh-tearing details on her departure from the crypt [right here](https://metalinjection.net/news/breakups/cradle-of-filth-keyboardist-zoe-marie-federoff-announces-her-departure) on [Metal Injection](https://metalinjection.net), the home of sonic slaughter. Crank the volume, my Moshpit Meat Grinders! No sorrow, just shred.
